body:
Is this cheating? The mother compare the guy with her husband but she didnt wear a ring on her finger.

Well there are several hentai with the wives still with her husbands and they didnt have the ring either, but most of the hentai where the wives didny wear ring on their finger are widow hentai.

A lot of widow hentai also compare their late husband with the other guy.

So whats the status for this 1...
